org.strongback

Interface DataRecorder


  • public interface DataRecorder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataRecorder register(String name, DataRecordable recordable)
      Registers by name a recordable object that likely has multiple channels.
      default DataRecorder register(String name, double scale, DoubleSupplier supplier)
      Registers by name a function that will be periodically polled to obtain a double value and scale it to an integer value that can be recorded.
      DataRecorder register(String name, IntSupplier supplier)
      Registers by name a function that will be periodically polled to obtain and record an integer value.
      DataRecorder register(String name, SpeedSensor sensor)
      Registers by name a speed sensor that will be periodically polled to obtain and record the current speed.
      DataRecorder register(String name, Switch swtch)
      Registers by name a switch that will be periodically polled to obtain and record the switch state.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        DataRecorder register(String name,
                      IntSupplier supplier)
        Registers by name a function that will be periodically polled to obtain and record an integer value. This method will remove any previously-registered supplier, switch, or motor with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this data supplier
        supplier - the IntSupplier of the value to be logged
        Returns:
        this instance so methods can be chained together; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplier parameter is null

      • register

        default DataRecorder register(String name,
                              double scale,
                              DoubleSupplier supplier)
        Registers by name a function that will be periodically polled to obtain a double value and scale it to an integer value that can be recorded. This method will remove any previously-registered supplier, switch, or motor with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this data supplier
        scale - the scale factor to multiply the supplier's double values before casting to an integer value
        supplier - the IntSupplier of the value to be logged
        Returns:
        this instance so methods can be chained together; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplier parameter is null

      • register

        DataRecorder register(String name,
                      Switch swtch)
        Registers by name a switch that will be periodically polled to obtain and record the switch state. This method will remove any previously-registered supplier, switch, or motor with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Switch
        swtch - the Switch to be logged
        Returns:
        this instance so methods can be chained together; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the swtch parameter is null

      • register

        DataRecorder register(String name,
                      SpeedSensor sensor)
        Registers by name a speed sensor that will be periodically polled to obtain and record the current speed. This method will remove any previously-registered supplier, switch, or motor with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the SpeedSensor
        sensor - the SpeedSensor to be logged
        Returns:
        this instance so methods can be chained together; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the sensor parameter is null

      • register

        DataRecorder register(String name,
                      DataRecordable recordable)
        Registers by name a recordable object that likely has multiple channels. This method will remove any previously-registered supplier, switch, or motor with the same name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the SpeedSensor
        recordable - the DataRecordable to be registered
        Returns:
        this instance so methods can be chained together; never null
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the sensor parameter is null
